question: 3 (c)
statement_html: On both figures from part (a), indicate the probability that the value of x is in the interval \(\displaystyle 5 \leq x \leq 7\).
statement_latex:
On both figures from
{part
(a)}, indicate the probability that the value of \emph{x} is in the
interval $\displaystyle 5 \leq x \leq 7$.
statement_raw: On both figures from [[Science:Math Exam Resources/Courses/MATH103/April 2005/Question 03 (a)|part (a)]], indicate the probability that the value of ''x'' is in the interval <math> \displaystyle 5 \leq x \leq 7 </math>.
